description: GHL tags for the TattooNOW Show system. Follows convention: [MODULE_ID]. [category] function : status

tags.name: WS. [show] episode : script_ready
tags.description: Script has been generated and reviewed

tags.name: WS. [show] guest : invited
tags.description: Guest has been invited to appear on the show

tags.name: WS. [show] guest : materials_received
tags.description: Guest headshot, bio, and portfolio images collected

tags.name: WS. [show] guest : appeared
tags.description: Guest has appeared on an episode

tags.name: WS. [show] affiliate : active
tags.description: Affiliate partner is active and receiving assets

tags.name: WS. [show] affiliate : notified
tags.description: Affiliate was notified about latest episode assets
